name: dvMail
overview:
dvMail is direct video email database marketing. We have the email and postal addresses of nearly 150 million double opt in consumer and B2B subscribers and use some 700 demographic, lifestyle and geographic targeting criteria to identify our clients’ very best prospects. We are CAN SPAM compliant and Safe Sender Certified.

Starting in 2001 as a traditional advertising agency with clients in the automotive aftermarket, housewares and professional sports categories, by 2005 we saw a strong shift in the way consumers preferred to get their information and began developing relationships with data aggregators to build a detailed database of consumers who wanted to receive targeted messages pertaining to their interests.

We now have clients in the following categories: automotive, automotive aftermarket, broadcasting, consumer finance, entertainment, healthcare, professional sports, restaurant, travel and recreation.
